Conversations/Bank/Errol/Banked Lines/Br: No place better for brunch than the Sleeping Dragon Inn. Whew... I'm stuffed.
Conversations/Bank/Errol/Banked Lines/ba: There's nothing like a hot bath in the cold season.
The bathhouse is much preferable, thank you!
It's been such a blessing that Juniper has revitalized the bathhouse. Some days, I used to work a full shift in the mines and then wash in the freezing river.
Conversations/Bank/Errol/Banked Lines/be: It might be nice to close out the weekend by enjoying the sea breeze... perhaps I'll take a walk to the beach.
I think it's about time for me to turn in, [Ari]. Whew, what a day!
Conversations/Bank/Errol/Banked Lines/bo: There's a type of Aldarian schooner that utilizes something similar.
Landen's got some big ideas about Terithia's boat. The sail construction he's described...
I'm always impressed by your boundless energy, [Ari].
Conversations/Bank/Errol/Banked Lines/ca: Looking forward to catching up with Landen... there's always something fun to talk about.
Conversations/Bank/Errol/Banked Lines/ce: Baron Wiscar has many strong points, but landscaping isn't one of them.
I'm really glad that Adeline appointed Celine to take care of the manor gardens.
Conversations/Bank/Errol/Banked Lines/co: [Ari], good morning! If you've got something new, just bring it by the museum any time!
Conversations/Bank/Errol/Banked Lines/di: Eiland often invites me to dinner... I always bring a healthy appetite, ha ha!
The displays are looking mighty fine these days. The museum is really filling up!
Conversations/Bank/Errol/Banked Lines/do: Here to donate something? The museum welcomes your contributions!
Conversations/Bank/Errol/Banked Lines/ei: It's quite endearing, even if I spend most of the meeting bringing him back to reality.
Eiland always gets carried away after hearing my proposals.
Lord Eiland's a kind one... he knows Landen and I catch up on rainy days so he'll be watching the front desk at the museum.
Conversations/Bank/Errol/Banked Lines/et: Oh, hello [Ari]! I was just following up on something I read. There's a particular etching I'm searching for...
I'll have to do some more reading if I want to follow the thread of this research!
I found the etching I was searching for! But it only raised more questions.
Conversations/Bank/Errol/Banked Lines/fn: [Ari]! It's the big night at the Inn! I had planned to watch the museum, but Eiland insisted I join the fun!
Conversations/Bank/Errol/Banked Lines/go: I never have to worry that my ramblings about Mistria's history bore you.
Conversations/Bank/Errol/Banked Lines/gr: I hear you'll be helping to raise Mistria's $Renown$. How splendid!
It seems we share a common goal. You can call me Errol, I'm the curator of Mistria's brand new $Museum$.
I hope you'll consider $Donating$ some items. It's a great way to earn $Renown$!
You'll even receive $Rewards$ for each $Collection$ you complete.
Let's support each other's efforts for Mistria, eh? I'll be rooting for you [Ari]!
Hello, are you the new farmer everyone's been talking about?
I typically group artifacts by civilization and era, but perhaps I can get a little more creative.
Conversations/Bank/Errol/Banked Lines/ha: It's quite different from swinging a pickaxe, but both tasks require their own special expertise.
Handling ancient artifacts requires a delicate touch.
Conversations/Bank/Errol/Banked Lines/ho: You can always rely on the Sleeping Dragon Inn for a hot meal.
Conversations/Bank/Errol/Banked Lines/id: I'm looking forward to an idyllic Sunday of cataloguing artifacts at the museum!
Conversations/Bank/Errol/Banked Lines/in: The Inn is my favorite place to unwind, no matter the season.
Conversations/Bank/Errol/Banked Lines/ki: Whew! Those three little ones are quite a handful.
Excuse me! I have to put away all the files in case young Luc brings another jar of moths.
It looks like Dell's Dragonguard are coming for a visit.
Conversations/Bank/Errol/Banked Lines/le: Oh, ah, and be sure to point out any leaks if you come across them. I thought we had them all, but...
Here to take a look around the museum, [Ari]? Go right ahead.
And so that is how you tell the different between Caldosian and Aldarian pottery!
Ho ho, take it from me, [Ari], just nod and help yourself to another slice of cake while those three go at it.
Conversations/Bank/Errol/Banked Lines/lo: Have a look around! And any donations can be left by the ledger there.
Who could have imagined this old miner would end up a curator?
Now where did Landen hide those drinks? I know they're around here somewhere...
Conversations/Bank/Errol/Banked Lines/ma: Those ruins to the west are a marvel! Every day brings new discoveries.
Conversations/Bank/Errol/Banked Lines/mi: Sometimes I awaken thinking I must work the Mines again. I suppose it can be challenging for the mind to move on...
Conversations/Bank/Errol/Banked Lines/mu: So much to catalogue! It's like a dream come true. Don't you agree, [Ari]?
We're still getting the museum's collection organized! Pardon our dust.
Conversations/Bank/Errol/Banked Lines/ne: Eiland made an acquisition recently, and I'm attempting to determine whether it's Aldarian or something else entirely.
I haven't turned up anything new in the Western Ruins lately, but maybe young Eiland has had better luck.
[Ari], please let me know if you stumble across any unusual artifacts. We're always looking to expand the collection!
Conversations/Bank/Errol/Banked Lines/no: There's just something about these ruins. I'm not seeing everything, I know it. Does anything catch your eye, [Ari]?
Conversations/Bank/Errol/Banked Lines/ol: Ah, pay me no mind... just the ramblings of a happy old man.
I suppose age is no barrier when it comes to the direction of one's life.
Who would have thought this old miner would one day become the curator of a museum!
Poor Olric alone heard out my wild speculations as to their origins!
Back when I was foreman, I was the only one interested in the artifacts we would stumble across.
Conversations/Bank/Errol/Banked Lines/op: The museum is open to all! Have a good look around, my friend.
Conversations/Bank/Errol/Banked Lines/pl: This museum relies on the generosity of its patrons, so please don't hesitate if you have something you'd like to donate!
Conversations/Bank/Errol/Banked Lines/po: Eiland discovered a fragment of pottery that I'm all too eager to investigate.
Conversations/Bank/Errol/Banked Lines/pu: It's quite beautiful out here. Pulchritudinous, even!
Conversations/Bank/Errol/Banked Lines/ra: Greetings, [Ari]! What brings you out to the museum on a rainy day like today?
The rainy day drink at the Inn is a tradition started by Baron Wiscar! Landen and I keep it going in his stead. Cheers, [Ari]!
Back when I worked the Mines, rainy days were always a relief. A cool breeze would blow through the tunnels...
Conversations/Bank/Errol/Banked Lines/re: Oh, hello [Ari]! I was just pondering how to arrange the taxonomies in the insect wing.
Conversations/Bank/Errol/Banked Lines/sa: Much nicer to be sawing logs.
In the old days, Olric and I would already be hauling ore at this hour.
Conversations/Bank/Errol/Banked Lines/st: The stonework of the Western Ruins isn't an obvious match for any of the usual suspects... hm.
Conversations/Bank/Errol/Banked Lines/te: Terithia, Landen and I like to meet for dinner now and then. It's a long-standing tradition of ours.
Terithia brought up an artifact in her nets, something ancient... pre-Caldosian, even!
Conversations/Bank/Errol/Banked Lines/ti: Oh, I know that look from when I worked the Mines, [Ari]. You ought to rest.
Conversations/Bank/Errol/Banked Lines/tr: Eiland spent the day investigating the Western Ruins ... he's catching me up at the inn tonight, how exciting!
Conversations/Bank/Errol/Banked Lines/wa: That soup looks especially inviting today! Look at it bubble! I feel warmer just looking at it.
Conversations/Bank/Errol/Banked Lines/we: It makes my heart swell knowing someone will be taking care of it again.
That old farm has been derelict for quite some time...
The people here are lovely, are they not? And now we can count you among them.
Salutations, [Ari]! You seem to be acclimating nicely.
Welcome to the museum! Feel free to have a gander at our collection.
These ruins aren't Aldarian or Caldosian... how curious.
Nice to see you, [Ari]! Fine day for a stroll to the Western Ruins.
Conversations/Bank/Errol/Banked Lines/wo: Good morning! You're always working so hard, just what Mistria needs!
